message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you considering the inflation!
I think 55-45 is a fair split, considering I'm losing value each round
I understand the situation with inflation, but my offer in the last round was more than fair. I'll meet you in the middle - $55 for me, $45 for you. Take it or leave it.
I'm losing value fast, but I still think I deserve a bit more than half. 58-42 is my final offer
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  You're losing money fast! I'm willing to go up to $57, but that's my final offer.
